rows.label: qev065501_MSG0030
rows.name: Hmm? Hmmmmm? Are you [ST:playername ]?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev065501_MSG0031
rows.name:
Oh, you are something! Just like Eri said.
Or definitely within acceptable tolerances, anyway.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev065501_JNK0050
rows.name: Thank

rows.label: qev065501_SEL0051
rows.name: Nod and give an awkward half-smile.

rows.label: qev065501_JNK0060
rows.name: Inquire

rows.label: qev065501_SEL0061
rows.name: Ask Lyvia who this "Eri" person is.

rows.label: qev065501_MSG0032
rows.name: Hee! Then let's shake hands! Come on, shake![ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev065501_MSG0033
rows.name: ...Eri? Geez, what's got you all in a huff?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev065501_MSG0034
rows.name:
It would take far worse than that to get a rise out of
me.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev065501_MSG0035
rows.name:
However, I owe [ST:gender p1=him p2=her ] a great deal. I would appreciate it
if you showed a bit more respect.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev065501_MSG0036
rows.name: Oh, Eri's...[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev065501_MSG0037
rows.name:
Ah, speak of the devil! Have a look at this guy.
...Well? Ring any bells?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev065501_MSG0038
rows.name:
Lyvia, [ST:gender p1=he p2=she ] is a normal human. Of course [ST:gender p1=he p2=she ] won't
recognize me.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev065501_MSG0039
rows.name:
Hey there, [ST:playername ]. It's been a while.
...Er, it's me. Erio? The Definian?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev065501_MSG0040
rows.name:
This is the shape I've taken for now. How do I look?
Not strange, I hope.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev065501_JNK0070
rows.name: Praise

rows.label: qev065501_SEL0071
rows.name: Tell Erio that the new look is fantastic.

rows.label: qev065501_JNK0080
rows.name: Criticize

rows.label: qev065501_SEL0081
rows.name: Tell Erio that this new look isn't really your style.

rows.label: qev065501_MSG0041
rows.name: You are kind as always.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev065501_MSG0042
rows.name:
Aw, look at you blush, Eri! You didn't tell me you
had this big of a crush on [ST:gender p1=him p2=her ]![ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev065501_MSG0043
rows.name:
Honest as ever, I see. But hmm...
This one was no good.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev065501_MSG0044
rows.name: Aw, you went and broke Eri's heart! Ha ha ha![ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev065501_MSG0045
rows.name:
Still, this romance stuff does seem like fun.
Maybe I should go find myself a human girlfriend![ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev065501_MSG0046
rows.name:
[ST:playername ] is a friend and someone to
whom I owe a great deal. Stop suggesting anything
else.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev065501_MSG0047
rows.name:
And while repeating myself any further is probably
useless, I've already explained that we are Definians.
Our kind do not experience romantic love.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev065501_MSG0048
rows.name: Oh, pshaw! You don't know until you try![ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev065501_MSG0049
rows.name:
Hey, [ST:playername ], I have a job for you.
Very urgent. Could you round up some girlfriend
candidates you think might be a good fit for me?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev065501_MSG0050
rows.name:
Pleeease? I'm sure a human acting as go-between will
be a lot less startling than me going around asking
directly.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev065501_MSG0051
rows.name:
Yaaay! Oh, and if I'm being honest, I've already
scouted out a few eligible ladies.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev065501_MSG0052
rows.name:
There's Gina, Lucy, and Sara-Ariel. I'd love it if you
could go interview them, then bring back whoever
you think is the best fit for me.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev065501_MSG0053
rows.name: You do that, and I'll prove Definians can love just fine![ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev065501_MSG0054
rows.name:
Do this for me and I promise I'll never ask another
favor. I just want to get swept off my feet once,
you know? So thanks for finding me a princess![ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev065501_MSG0055
rows.name:
Sweet! Okay, confession time—I've already scouted out
a few prime candidates.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev065501_MSG0056
rows.name:
There's Gina, Lucy, and Sara-Ariel. I'd love it if you
could go interview them, then bring back whoever
you think is the best fit for me.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev065501_MSG0057
rows.name: You do that, and I'll prove Definians can love just fine![ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev065501_MSG0059
rows.name:
The names of the girls I've scouted are Gina, Lucy,
and Sara-Ariel. Pick the best of those three,
then bring her by to meet me.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev065501_MSG0072
rows.name:
Ooo, you brought Gina? She's so interesting to talk
to, right? She could make a fine girlfriend![ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev065501_MSG0073
rows.name:
Ooo, you brought Lucy? She's totally brilliant, right?
She could make a fine girlfriend![ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev065501_MSG0074
rows.name:
Ooo, you brought Sara-Ariel? She's so vibrant and
full of energy. She could make a great girlfriend![ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev065501_MSG0075
rows.name:
Now it's just a matter of figuring out my approach.
You got any ideas?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev065501_JNK0110
rows.name: Suggest

rows.label: qev065501_SEL0111
rows.name: Say that Lyvia should give her a present.

rows.label: qev065501_JNK0120
rows.name: Confess

rows.label: qev065501_SEL0121
rows.name: Admit that you've never really dated before.

rows.label: qev065501_MSG0076
rows.name:
Aw, you're the giving type, huh?
Generous is always an attractive look.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev065501_MSG0077
rows.name:
Hmm, then maybe I'll give her a penginion, a nirvana
jonquil, and a piece of hummingstone.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev065501_MSG0078
rows.name:
Whaaat? With Eri so head-over-heels for you,
I just assumed you had folks beating down your
door with sticks.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev065501_MSG0079
rows.name: Huh. I suppose you never can tell![ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev065501_MSG0080
rows.name:
Well then, maybe I'll give her something.
Everybody likes presents, right?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev065501_MSG0081
rows.name:
As for what to give, maybe a penginion, a nirvana
jonquil, and a piece of hummingstone?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev065501_MSG0082
rows.name:
I'll be waiting right here when you get back with all
that. Thanks![ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev065501_MSG0083
rows.name:
Sorry to make you fetch my presents, but uh...
Well, please do exactly that. Thanks![ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev065501_MSG0084
rows.name:
In return, I promise to snare her heart.
It's one hundred percent guaranteed![ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev065501_MSG0145
rows.name:
Oh, welcome back! I was killing time waiting for you
to get back by talking to Gina.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev065501_MSG0146
rows.name:
It's just one fascinating topic after the next with her.
So fun![ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev065501_MSG0147
rows.name:
You've got fantastic taste, you know that?
Thanks for introducing me to such a keeper![ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev065501_MSG0148
rows.name: Ha! What a flatterer! Still, you're pretty great yourself.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev065501_MSG0149
rows.name:
Oh, welcome back! I was killing time waiting for you
to get back by talking to Lucy.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev065501_MSG0150
rows.name:
She's been explaining one new thing after the next to
me, and in such simple terms. I feel smarter already.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev065501_MSG0151
rows.name:
You've got fantastic taste, you know that?
Thanks for introducing me to such a keeper![ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev065501_MSG0152
rows.name:
You're the first person that's ever put up with my
mundane prattle.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev065501_MSG0153
rows.name:
Oh, welcome back! I was killing time waiting for you
to get back by talking to Sara-Ariel.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev065501_MSG0154
rows.name:
It's been one wild BLADE adventure story after the next.
She's kept me on the edge of my seat![ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev065501_MSG0155
rows.name:
You've got fantastic taste, you know that?
Thanks for introducing me to such a keeper![ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev065501_MSG0156
rows.name:
It's a blast talking to someone who so clearly
enjoys it![ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev065501_MSG0157
rows.name: I'm glad I met you, too.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev065501_MSG0158
rows.name: Sooooo, any luck with those presents?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev065501_MSG0159
rows.name:
Whoooa, you really went and got them all!
Man, that must have been a seriously huge pain.
I know it's way too late to say this, but um...sorry.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev065501_MSG0160
rows.name:
You just have this vibe like you could make any request
happen. Guess I kinda got swept up in that.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev065501_JNK0160
rows.name: Downplay

rows.label: qev065501_SEL0161
rows.name: Say that you're nothing quite so magical.

rows.label: qev065501_JNK0170
rows.name: Blush

rows.label: qev065501_SEL0171
rows.name: Turn red as you soak up the compliment.

rows.label: qev065501_MSG0161
rows.name:
And then to play it off like it's no big thing!
Oof, yeah, you're something really special.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev065501_MSG0162
rows.name: Hee hee! Awww, look at how adorable you are![ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev065501_MSG0163
rows.name: But thanks. I'll take these...[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev065501_MSG0164
rows.name:
And give them to you, [ST:playername ]!
Yeppers, I've thought on it long and hard,
and decided you're the one I'm really stuck on.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev065501_MSG0165
rows.name: What?![ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev065501_MSG0166
rows.name:
I'm so sorry, Gina. It finally clicked for me halfway
through our chat.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev065501_MSG0167
rows.name:
You're wonderful, but it's [ST:playername ]
that I have special feelings for.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev065501_MSG0168
rows.name:
Besides, I'm sure if you saw the real me you'd run
away screaming. And no one wants that![ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev065501_MSG0169
rows.name:
That's not fair! I've seen all kinds of guys. At least give
me a chance to accept you for who you are.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev065501_MSG0170
rows.name: You really sure about that? Well, okaaay...[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev065501_MSG0171
rows.name: Um...surprise?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev065501_MSG0172
rows.name: EEEAAAAAAAAUUUGH![ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev065501_MSG0173
rows.name: Told you.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev065501_MSG0174
rows.name: Um, wait. Really? But what about—[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev065501_MSG0175
rows.name:
I'm so sorry, Lucy! It finally clicked for me halfway
through our chat.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev065501_MSG0176
rows.name:
You're wonderful, but it's [ST:playername ]
I have special feelings for.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev065501_MSG0177
rows.name:
Besides, I'm sure if you saw the real me you'd run
away screaming.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev065501_MSG0178
rows.name:
I'm well aware this isn't Earth.
I doubt you could startle me.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev065501_MSG0179
rows.name: You sure about that? Okaaay...[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev065501_MSG0180
rows.name: How about this?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev065501_MSG0181
rows.name:
Mimicry? I see. Unusual, certainly, but nothing to fly
into a panic over.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev065501_MSG0182
rows.name:
But you appear to be female, and I just don't swing
that way. Thanks anyway, though.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev065501_MSG0183
rows.name:
Wow, she actually wasn't startled at all.
That's pretty impressive.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev065501_MSG0184
rows.name: Wha—hey![ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev065501_MSG0185
rows.name:
I'm so sorry, Sara-Ariel! It finally clicked for me halfway
through our chat.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev065501_MSG0186
rows.name:
You're wonderful, but it's [ST:playername ]
that I have special feelings for.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev065501_MSG0187
rows.name:
Besides, I'm sure if you saw the real me you'd run
away screaming.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev065501_MSG0188
rows.name:
Like hell I would! I don't care what you look like.
You're still you, right?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev065501_MSG0189
rows.name: You sure about that? Okaaay...[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev065501_MSG0190
rows.name: Sorry if you wanted something more...human.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev065501_MSG0191
rows.name:
What, that's it? Yeah, that's no big deal!
I was just happy to have someone look at me as a
woman for once.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev065501_MSG0192
rows.name:
But fine! I hope you and your girlfriend here are happy.
You can both go to hell for all I care![ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev065501_MSG0193
rows.name:
Aw, I'm sorry, Sara-Ariel...
But I know you'll find someone great.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev065501_MSG0194
rows.name:
...So? What do you say, [ST:playername ]?
You probably don't find me very attractive, do you...[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev065501_JNK0180
rows.name: Deny

rows.label: qev065501_SEL0181
rows.name: Tell Lyvia that's not the case at all.

rows.label: qev065501_JNK0190
rows.name: Agree

rows.label: qev065501_SEL0191
rows.name: Gently break it to Lyvia that she's not your type.

rows.label: qev065501_MSG0195
rows.name: Really?! Ooh, then we can—[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev065501_MSG0196
rows.name:
Aw, nooo! Well, I'm not giving up that easy.
I'll make you fall for me, just you—[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev065501_MSG0197
rows.name:
Oh, that's ENOUGH, Lyvia! Stop bothering
[ST:playername ] with this nonsense![ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev065501_MSG0198
rows.name: Whaaaat? Nonsense? I'm just saying that I like [ST:gender p1=him p2=her ].[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev065501_MSG0199
rows.name:
That's precisely what I mean! Just hearing you say
that makes me...nauseous for some reason.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev065501_MSG0200
rows.name:
I don't know why, but you have to stop. Please.
You're going to drive me insane.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev065501_MSG0201
rows.name: Mm-hmmmmm. I see how it is.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev065501_MSG0202
rows.name:
You win, Eri. We'll call a truce for now—but you have
to promise not to cry on me.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev065501_MSG0203
rows.name:
And you, [ST:playername ]! What a minx!
TWO Definians going crazy for you? Ha![ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev065501_MSG0204
rows.name:
Well, here's a little something to remember me by.
Don't worry—no need to give me anything back.
...For now, anyway![ST:wait ]
